title: Epic Instagram Reel Creator
job_overview:
I am looking for an EXPERIENCED virtual assistant to create 10-20 Reels per month. The ideal VA is SMART, FAST, and CREATIVE. 

I am looking to add someone HARDWORKING, DEDICATED, and HONEST to the team. This is part-time work that will begin with a few hours per week, but I always offer additional work to my team first, so there is potential to grow quickly. We are a small children's book publishing company with an author coaching program. Reels will be about the books we publish and the process of writing children's books. 

If this sounds like you, please respond with an example of a reel you've created and the title of a song you loved as a teen.
